app.name: Snes9x RX
app.long_description:
Featuring: - MSU-1 audio enhancement chip support. - Classic Controllers support (NES / SNES) - Mayflash 2-port SNES USB adapter - Xbox 360 Controller (wired) support. - Experimental DualShock 3 (wired) support. - Wii U Pro Controller support. - Wii U Gamepad controller support through VC injects. - Retrode 2 USB adapter support. - Screenshot/Cover/Artwork display. Swap between them with the +/Z button!
- Sharp / Soft / HQ2X / Scale2x / Scanline filters. - Super FX overclock (20/40/60 MHz). - Wiiflow plugin mode. - FPS counter toggle. - Screenshot button.
